resources.string: Camp Cambodia Trek School Expedition Cambodia is a spectacular natural beauty, filled with cultural sites and captivating people. Visit ancient historic sites such as the iconic Angkor Wat temple – the largest religious monument in the world, and the spectacular jungle temple of Ta Prohm. During your 4 week life-enhancing school expedition you’ll take a boat to the fascinating floating village on Tonle Sap Lake, experience the energetic hustle and bustle of the Siem Reap Night Markets and gain a new perspective on life as you explore the recent history of Cambodia at the Killing Fields and S21 Prison. Challenge yourself on a 4-5 day trek through the vibrant jungle, taking in the incredible sights and atmosphere before pitching your tent for a nights sleep under the monks pagoda.
This is where the progress will be updated and the total raised shown in the thermometer
